Soul Siphon.name: Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.blurb: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.
Soul Siphon.description: Innate: Morgana restores health equal to 20% of ability damage dealt to champions, large minions and large monsters.
Soul Siphon.notes: * Soul Siphon's healing will not apply on Morgana's damage dealing item effects.

Dark Binding.name: Dark Binding
Dark Binding.blurb: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
Dark Binding.description: Active: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic that travels in a line, dealing  magic damage to the first enemy hit and  rooting them.

Tormented Soil.name: Tormented Soil
Tormented Soil.blurb: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
Tormented Soil.description: Active: Morgana infects the target area for 5 seconds, causing enemies who stand on the location to take magic damage every half second, increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health).
Tormented Soil.leveling:
Minimum Damage Per Half Second:
8 / 16 / 24 / 32 / 40 (+ 11% AP)
Maximum Damage Per Half Second:
12 / 24 / 36 / 48 / 60 (+ 16.5% AP)
Minimum Total Damage:
80 / 160 / 240 / 320 / 400 (+ 110% AP)
Maximum Total Damage:
120 / 240 / 360 / 480 / 600 (+ 165% AP)
Tormented Soil.description2: Tormented Soil's cooldown is reduced by 5% whenever  Soul Siphon triggers.
Tormented Soil.notes:
* Tormented Soil's first tick occurs as soon as Morgana casts.
 Damage from multiple Tormented Soils do not stack.

Black Shield.name: Black Shield
Black Shield.blurb: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
Black Shield.description: Active: Morgana  shields the target allied champion for up to 5 seconds, which absorbs magic damage and dispels  crowd control effects while the shield holds.
Black Shield.notes:
* Black Shield has no cast time and does not interrupt Morgana's previous orders.
 Unlike  spell shields Black Shield will only negate crowd control effects ( Wall of Pain's  slow but not its magic resistance reduction) before any magic damage is absorbed (even if Black Shield is broken by an enemy spell its associated disables will not apply). As such, a  Thresh's  Death Sentence will not cc the shielded target, but will allow Thresh to activate the dash-to-target effect of his ability.
 Although not considered a crowd control, the Black Shield may also block  Illaoi's  Test of Spirit, spirit pull. 

 Black Shield will always take priority over regular shields but, if used in conjunction with  Hexdrinker's or  Sterak's Gage's Lifeline, the most recently-applied one will do so.
 Black Shield will not negate self-inflicted disables ( Junkyard Titan's Overheat  silence).

Soul Shackles.name: Soul Shackles
Soul Shackles.blurb: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
Soul Shackles.description: Active: After a 0.5-second delay, Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing magic damage.
Soul Shackles.description2: The tethers maintain at range for 3 seconds,  revealing affected enemies and  slowing them by 20%. Additionally, Morgana gains bonus movement speed towards tethered enemies.
Soul Shackles.description3: When the duration ends, tethered targets are  revealed and  stunned for 1.5 seconds and dealt the same magic damage again.
Soul Shackles.notes:
* Soul Shackles cannot be interrupted by crowd control and will persist throughout  Zhonya's Hourglass'  stasis,  Guardian Angel's passive, and  Chronoshift's revival, but can be stopped with Morgana's death.
  Spell shield will only block the initial damage, not the damage that occurs if the target didn't leave the tether range.
